title: Martian Probe
summaries: The Martian Probe is a rare Hardmode, post-Golem flying enemy that can spawn anywhere in the outer two thirds of the map. It is most commonly found in the space layer. It does not fly through blocks until it spots a player. The Martian Probe initially appears with a green light. When it detects the player, the light turns red, and it attempts to escape. If allowed to, it initiates the Martian Madness event.
It is one of the few entities that can be detected by the <linked>Lifeform Analyzer</linked> or its upgrades.

statistics.Damage: 5/10/15
statistics.Max Life: 500/1000/1500
